scripts.i-all: cd ./frontend && yarn install && cd .. && cd ./hardhat && npm i && cd ..
scripts.hh-dev-l: cd ./hardhat && yarn hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy_upgradeable_KyrieEther.ts && cd ..
scripts.hh-clear: cd ./hardhat && yarn hardhat clean && yarn hardhat clear-abi && cd ..
scripts.hh-dev: cd ./hardhat && yarn hardhat clean && yarn hardhat clear-abi && yarn hardhat compile && yarn hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.ts && cd ..
